full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL PO CHEN PO YANG GSANG MDUNG DMAR CAN PHYAG MTSAN BZHI PA 'KHOR BCAS LA BSTOD CING 'PHRIN LAS BSOS PA'I BSTAN BCOS KHAMS GSUM 'GUGS PA'I LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES RGYAL PO CHEN PO YANG @005A *, ,GSANG MDUNG DMAR CAN PHYAG MTSAN BZHI PA 'KHOR BCAS LA BSTOD CING 'PHRIN LAS BSOS PA'I BSTAN BCOS KHAMS GSUM 'GUGS PA'I LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, ^ MNYAM MED SH'AKYA'I RGYAL PO'I RING LUGS 'DZIN CING KHAMS GSUM CHOS KYI RGYAL PO TZONG KHA PA CHEN PO'I RING LUGS 'DZIN PA GSHIN GYI RNAL 'BYOR BA RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES DPAL BZANG PO'AM, ,MING GZHAN SNANG MDZAD RDO RJES SBYAR BAS DON RAB TU GRUB PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
